AuctionInfo.color: Color // color of tokens for sale
AuctionInfo.creator: Agent // issuer of start_auction transaction
AuctionInfo.deposit: Int // deposit by auction owner to cover the SC fees
AuctionInfo.highestBid: Int // the current highest bid amount
AuctionInfo.numTokens: Int // number of tokens for sale
AuctionInfo.ownerMargin: Int // auction owner's margin in promilles

BidInfo.amount: Int // cumulative amount of bids from same bidder
BidInfo.index: Int // index of bidder in bidder list
BidInfo.timestamp: Int // timestamp of most recent bid

startAuction.color: Color // color of the tokens being auctioned
startAuction.description: ?String // description of the tokens being auctioned
startAuction.minimumBid: Int // minimum required amount for any bid

finalizeAuction.#owner: contract // only SC itself can invoke this function

setOwnerMargin.#owner: creator // only SC creator can set owner margin
setOwnerMargin.ownerMargin: Int // new SC owner margin in promilles
